reviewText: It's great!  Just want I wanted

As it says on the tin - the only instructional film on combat shooting made by the U.S Army in WWII
I think it's a lot better than what I was taught in the army (35 years later) and if it was good enough to beat the nazis then it's good enough for me!
His book - close quarter combat methods.... explains how to apply the same principles to shoulder-fired weapons
